location.zh-cn: 北京市通州区运河东大街57号院6号楼

description.zh-cn: 北京市人民政府的组成部门，是主管北京市司法行政工作的省级司法行政机关。
description.en: A constituent department of the Beijing Municipal People's Government, it is the provincial-level judicial administrative organ in charge of judicial administration in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，担任北京市司法局党委书记、副局长。
description.en: Chinese politician, serving as the Party Secretary and a Deputy Director of the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Justice.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国司法部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国司法部
en: Ministry of Justice of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院组成部门，主管全国司法行政工作。
description.en: A constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, responsible for national judicial administration.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市的省级地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level local state administrative organ of Beijing, People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会政法委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会领导政法工作的职能部门。
description.en: The functional department of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China that leads political and legal work.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会全面依法治市委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会全面依法治市委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会的议事协调机构，其办公室设在北京市司法局。
description.en: The deliberative and coordinating body of the CPC Beijing Municipal Committee, with its office located in the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Justice.

nodes.id: 中国共产党北京市委员会全面依法治市委员会办公室

zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会全面依法治市委员会办公室
中共北京市委依法治市办

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党北京市委员会全面依法治市委员会的办事机构，设在北京市司法局。
description.en: The working body of the Beijing Municipal Committee of the Communist Party of China for Comprehensive Rule of Law, located in the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Justice.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都和直辖市。
description.en: The capital and a direct-administered municipality of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 指吸毒者戒除吸食、注射毒品的恶习。
description.en: Refers to the process of an addict ceasing the abuse of ingested or injected drugs.

description.zh-cn: 一种非监禁的刑罚执行方式，将符合法定条件的罪犯置于社区内，由专门的国家机关在相关社会团体和民间组织以及社会志愿者的协助下，在判决、裁定或决定确定的期限内，矫正其犯罪心理和行为恶习，并促进其顺利回归社会的制度。
description.en: A non-custodial form of punishment execution where eligible offenders are placed in the community. Under the supervision of specialized state organs, with the assistance of relevant social groups, non-governmental organizations, and volunteers, their criminal psychology and bad habits are corrected within a specified period, facilitating their smooth reintegration into society.

zh-cn: 北京市公共法律服务中心

description.en: A directly affiliated institution of the Beijing Municipal Bureau of Justice.
